level1.name: Report a scam or fraud
level1.instruction: Click 'Next' button after selecting this option

level2.name: Report an issue with the an app
level2.instruction: Select 'Report an issue with the an app' from dropdown

level3.name: A virus alert or said my device was hacked
level3.instruction: Select 'A virus alert or said my device was hacked' from dropdown

level4.name: Text for Claim
level4.instruction: Write your complaint text in the text area

reports.categoryPath: Report a scam or fraud > Report an issue with the an app > A virus alert or said my device was hacked

categoryLevels.level2: Report an issue with the an app
categoryLevels.level3: A virus alert or said my device was hacked

content.originalComplaint: This app shows that I have virus and forced me to buy subscription. Completely scam app! Return my money!
content.formattedReview: Dangerous scam!!!The app lies about "viruses" and pushes forced payments. Do not trust this!
